parameters.filename:
concat('product_data_', 
       toString(year(currentDate())), '-', 
       lpad(toString(month(currentDate())), 2, '0'), '-', 
       lpad(toString(dayOfMonth(currentDate())), 2, '0'), '-', 
       lpad(toString(hour(currentDate())), 2, '0'), '-', 
       lpad(toString(minute(currentDate())), 2, '0'), '-', 
       lpad(toString(second(currentDate())), 2, '0'), 
       '.csv')

parameters.Filename:
concat('sales_data_', 
    toString(year(currentDate())), '-', 
    toString(month(currentDate())), '-', 
    toString(dayOfMonth(currentDate())), '-',
    toString(hour(currentDate())), '-',
    toString(minute(currentDate())), '-',
    toString(second(currentDate())))

scriptLines: RemoveNullCustID derive(Email = iif(isNull(CustomerID), Email, iif(isNull(Email), 'Unknown', Email)),
join1 derive(Price = iif(isNull(Price), AvgPrice, Price)) ~> Replacepricenullvalue
DistinctbyProdid derive(StockQuantity = iif(or(equals(toString(StockQuantity), '0'), equals(toString(StockQuantity), 'None')), 0, toInteger(StockQuantity))) ~> Stockquantitycheck

transformations.name: MapDriftedColumns
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

scriptLines: split1@ValidRecords derive(SaleDate = iif(isNull(SaleDate), toString(currentDate()), SaleDate)) ~> Salesdatereplacenull
